title: Tour de France winner Egan Bernal fined $500 for littering, with a 1-minute penalty looming for second offense
content:
2019 Tour de France champion is latest rider nabbed by the UCI's 'litter patrol.'

Read the full article at Tour de France winner Egan Bernal fined $500 for littering, with a 1-minute penalty looming for second offense on Velo.
author: ahood
